## Description {#details}

The mod/ref information collected for a particular function.

We collect information about mod/ref behavior of a function here, both in general and as pertains to specific globals. We only have this detailed information when we know <em>something</em> useful about the behavior. If we saturate to fully general mod/ref, we remove the info for the function.

Definition at line 63 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/globalsmodref-cpp">GlobalsModRef.cpp</a>.

The bit that flags that this function may read any global.

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="a663d209e70aa95872d1a553199751674a6b317ffae69da9b553e1656472554509" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MayReadAnyGlobal">
 (= 4)
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

This is chosen to mix together with <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9db8c44b250b90e3ab7e4d144e7c9c2e">ModRefInfo</a> bits. FIXME: This assumes <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9db8c44b250b90e3ab7e4d144e7c9c2e">ModRefInfo</a> lattice will remain 4 bits! <a href="#a3fd3dff91e81708c4c2a430e621a7b2f">FunctionInfo.getModRefInfo()</a> masks out everything except ModRef so this remains correct.

<SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Attributes

### Info {#a4500d6507d837f7f413d51d2766741f2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>PointerIntPair&lt;AlignedMap &#42;, 3, unsigned, AlignedMapPointerTraits&gt; llvm::GlobalsAAResult::FunctionInfo::Info</>}>
All of the information is encoded into a single pointer, with a three bit integer in the low three bits.

The high bit provides a flag for when this function may read any global. The low two bits are the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9db8c44b250b90e3ab7e4d144e7c9c2e">ModRefInfo</a>. And the pointer, when non-null, points to a map from <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue">GlobalValue</a> to <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9db8c44b250b90e3ab7e4d144e7c9c2e">ModRefInfo</a> specific to that <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue">GlobalValue</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/globalsmodref-cpp/#l00203">203</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/globalsmodref-cpp">GlobalsModRef.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
